merklDistributionCreator().details: Address is the same across the different chains on which it is deployed

notifyReward(address,uint256).details: Callable by any contractThis method can be used to recover leftover ANGLE tokens in the contract

gaugeParams(address).notice: Maps a gauge to its reward parameters

merklDistributionCreator().notice: Address of the Merkl contract managing rewards to be distributed

notifyReward(address,uint256).notice: Transmits rewards from the `AngleDistributor` to the `DistributionCreator` with the correct parameters

notifyRewardWithTransfer(address,uint256.notice: Fetches tokens and transmits rewards in the same transaction

setAngleAllowance().notice: Restores the allowance for the ANGLE token to the `DistributionCreator` contract

setGauge(address,(bytes32,address,addres.notice: Specifies the reward distribution parameters for `gauge`
